name: Clockwork Myrmidon
description: A large, mechanical construct designed for combat, resembling armored warriors with formidable physical attributes.
memorable: Its ability to explode upon destruction, potentially damaging nearby enemies, adds a layer of danger.
goals: Primarily functions as a front-line combatant, controlling the battlefield and inflicting damage.
relations: Act as soldiers or guardians, possibly created by more intelligent beings.
environment: Typically found in areas of magical or mechanical creation, such as a wizard's tower or gnome workshop.
strengths: Immunity to poison, psychic damage, and many conditions, alongside Magic Resistance against spells.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, limiting its effectiveness in mental tasks.
attacks: Multiattack includes a Slam and two Heavy Pick attacks, with an option for an area fire jet.
most_powerful_ability: Alchemical Flame Jet, allowing it to deal fire damage in a straight line, affecting multiple targets.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 16, which aids in detecting the surroundings.
skills: Skilled in Athletics with a +8 bonus, showcasing its physical prowess.
additional_information: Construct Nature, requiring no air, food, or sleep
Explodes on destruction, causing area damage
Can spray alchemical grease to create difficult terrain
Magic Resistance provides advantage against magical attacks
test_queries: large mechanical soldier with fire attacks
powerful melee combatant with area control
battlefield control using grease and fire
